scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field3]@[field0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[field5];branch=[branch] From: "[field1]" <sip:[field1]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[field2]> Contact: <sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[field5];transport=[transport]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE User-Agent: Asterisk PBX Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO Supported: replaces Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:[field3]@[field0] SIP/2.0 [last_Via] From: "[field1]" <sip:[field1]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[field2]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[field5];transport=[transport] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[field3]@[field0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[field5];branch=[branch] From: "[field1]" <sip:[field1]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[field2]> Contact: <sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[field5];transport=[transport]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE User-Agent: Asterisk PBX [field4] Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO Supported: replaces Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:[field3]@[field0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[field5];branch=[branch] From: "[field1]" <sip:[field1]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[field2]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[field5];transport=[transport] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[field3]@[field0]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[field5];branch=[branch] From: "[field1]" <sip:[field1]@[field2]:[field5]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field3]@[field2]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: sip:[field1]@[local_ip]:[field5];transport=[transport] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
